languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар объявил себя комендантом Простора Коронус и разместил свою ставку на Футфоле, как в наиболее логистически удобной точке. Лорд-капитану необходимо обсудить с ним происходящее в Просторе и дальнейший план действий.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар объявил себя комендантом Простора Коронус и разместил свою ставку на Футфоле, как в наиболее логистически удобной точке. Лорд-капитан отправил{mf|ся|ась} обсудить с ним происходящее в Просторе и дальнейший план действий.

languages.text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар объявил себя комендантом Простора Коронус и разместил свою ставку на Футфоле, как в наиболее логистически удобной точке. Лорд-капитану необходимо обсудить с ним происходящее в Просторе и дальнейший план действий.

traits.locale_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the constable of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar s'est autoproclamé gardien des Étendues de Koronus et a installé son quartier général à Castel, puisqu'il s'agissait de l'emplacement le plus pratique d'un point de vue logistique. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit le rencontrer pour discuter de la situation actuelle dans les Étendues, ainsi que du prochain plan d'action.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar s'est nommé gardien des Étendues de Koronus et a installé son quartier général à Castel, puisqu'il s'agissait de l'emplacement le plus pratique d'un point de vue logistique. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit le rencontrer pour discuter de la situation actuelle dans les Étendues, ainsi que du prochain plan d'action.

languages.text: 大审判官卡尔卡扎已经成为了科罗努斯扩区的守护者，将他的指挥总部设置在了落脚港，因为这里的后勤运输最为便利。行商浪人需要与大审判官见面，了解科罗努斯扩区的现状，以及下一步的行动计划。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

traits.locale_text: 卡尔卡扎审判长已经成为了科罗努斯扩区总指挥，将他的指挥总部设置在了落脚港，因为这里的后勤运输最为便利。行商浪人需要与审判长见面，了解科罗努斯扩区的现状，以及下一步的行动计划。

languages.text: ロード・インクィジター、カルカサルは自らをコロヌス・エクスパンスのワーデンとして任命し、最も軍事作戦に便利な場所としてフットフォールに本部を据えた。ロード・キャプテンはエクスパンスの現状と次の行動計画について話し合うため、彼と会う必要がある。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジター、カルカサルは自らをコロヌス・エクスパンスのワーデンとして任命し、最も軍事作戦に便利な場所としてフットフォールに本部を据えた。ロード・キャプテンはエクスパンスの現状と次の行動計画について話し合うため、彼と会う必要がある。

languages.text: Großinquisitor Calcazar hat sich zum Wachtmeister der Koronus-Ausdehnung aufgeschwungen und sein Hauptquartier auf Footfall eingerichtet, dem logistisch sinnvollsten Ort. Der Lord Captain muss sich mit ihm treffen und über die aktuellen Ereignisse in der Ausdehnung und die nächsten Schritte sprechen.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

traits.locale_text: Großinquisitor Calcazar hat sich zum Wachtmeister der Koronus-Ausdehnung aufgeschwungen und sein Hauptquartier auf Footfall eingerichtet, dem logistisch sinnvollsten Ort. Der Lord Captain muss sich mit ihm treffen und über die aktuellen Ereignisse in der Ausdehnung und die nächsten Schritte sprechen.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor Calcazar se ha proclamado guardián de la Extensión de Koronus y se ha instalado en Paso dada la conveniencia estratégica de su posición. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán tendrá que reunirse con él para hablar de la situación en la Extensión de Koronus y planear su siguiente paso.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor Calcazar se ha proclamado protector de la Extensión de Koronus y se ha instalado en Paso dada la conveniencia estratégica de su posición. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán tendrá que reunirse con él para hablar de la situación en la Extensión de Koronus y planear su siguiente paso.

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, kendisini Koronus Enginliği Dizdarı ilan etti ve karargâhını lojistik açıdan daha uygun olması sebebiyle Binliman'a kurdu. Lord Kaptan, Enginlik'te yaşanan güncel olayların durumunu tartışmak ve sıradaki eylem planını belirlemek için onunla görüşmeli.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar has instated himself as the warden of the Koronus Expanse and set up his headquarters on Footfall as the most logistically convenient location. The Lord Captain needs to meet with him to discuss the present state of events in the Expanse and the next plan of action.
